verses.name: Luke 18:1
verses.text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end, that men ought always to pray, and not to faint;

verses.name: Luke 18:2
verses.text: Saying, There was in a city a judge, which feared not God, neither regarded man:

verses.name: Luke 18:3
verses.text: And there was a widow in that city; and she came unto him, saying, Avenge me of mine adversary.

verses.name: Luke 18:4
verses.text: And he would not for a while: but afterward he said within himself, Though I fear not God, nor regard man;

verses.name: Luke 18:5
verses.text: Yet because this widow troubleth me, I will avenge her, lest by her continual coming she weary me.
